entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: N 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
